home.description1: The idea to use cups comes from
home.description2: here I have added the feature to ask questions. You can find the source code

cups.green-description: Green - I am comfortable with my understanding and pacing of the lesson
cups.yellow-description: Yellow - I am working through my understanding, I would benefit from the teacher slowing down or revisiting the current concept
cups.red-description: Red - STOP! I am not understanding and I have a question
